text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A few days later, I'm at Hanshin<n>Racecourse to watch a big
race. And<n>low and behold, who should I run into<n>but...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Wait, aren't you—oh wow! That<n>badge... I didn't realize you
were a<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha, there's no need for that! Call<n>me Fine Motion. It's
nice to see you<n>again—I had a wonderful time the<n>other
day!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
What a coincidence, though. Who<n>would've thought I'd see
you here...<n>Although, I suppose this must be an<n>excellent
learning opportunity for a<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: As for me, I'm here to watch...<n>someone amazing.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
You're welcome to join me if you'd<n>like. I got up extra early
to get a good<n>spot! Let's cheer her on together!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They've entered the backstretch!<n>Today's favorite, T.M.
Opera O,<n>cruises along at the center of the<n>pack. At the
rear, we have Air Shakur,<n>keeping an eye on the
competition!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Heh. Just you watch!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Shakur! Good luuuck!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fine Motion bounces up and down<n>excitedly as she cheers,
eyes glued to<n>Air Shakur.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Shakur is such an inspiring racer.<n>She's so clever... but
she's also<n>painstakingly straightforward when it<n>comes
to her goals!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
They round the final corner and begin<n>their last spurt down
the homestretch!<n>T.M. Opera O breaks away from the<n>
pack—is the lead hers?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Not yet! Watch what Shakur's doing.<n>The last spurt is where
she shines<n>brightest!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Hraaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Air Shakur! Air Shakur chases the<n>lead! What precision—Air
Shakur<n>catches up just before the goal! Will it<n>be
enough?!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ah... Shakur!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: As Fine Motion cheers, something<n>catches my attention.
choice_data_list:
(She's got the same twinkle in her eye as she
did the other day...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
That was a great race, Shakur!<n>Especially the last spurt—the
way you<n>caught up was breathtaking! My<n>heart is still
going wild...

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Tch... Catch up, my ass. I got second,<n>idiot.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Yes, well... I know you wanted to win,<n>but... that doesn't
change how<n>impressive your technique was one<n>bit.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
The sheer precision you displayed<n>shows just how much
time you spent<n>calculating everything. And then the<n>fierce
determination as you ran... It<n>really, truly was stunning.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I made a very special memory today.<n>Thank you, Shakur!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ...Ugh, whatever.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I escort Fine Motion back to Tracen<n>and listen to her gush
the entire way.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, I can't get over it! Shakur was<n>so cool! Wasn't the last
spurt<n>amazing? The way she went all-out at<n>the end gave
me chills!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I keep seeing it over and over in my<n>head! She was biding
her time at first,<n>and then she took off like, like—

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text: Ah! Your Highness, come back!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Not yet... Not yet! Ihave to save my stamina, and then...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her sudden take-off caught me off<n>guard, but I'm even
more shocked by<n>how skilled she is.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her form is a little rough, but that justmeans she could go even fasterwith training! But most of all...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... Now! The last... spurt!Yaaaah!
choice_data_list: (She's got that gleam in her eyes again.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm frozen in place watching her. The<n>way she runs just
looks so...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: So fun.

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
Your Highness! Wh-what on earth do<n>you think you're
doing?! Have you<n>forgotten the terms of the study<n>abroad
trip? You mustn't over-exert<n>yourself!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Eh? ...Oh! I beg your pardon! I don't<n>know what came over
me... I'm sorry.
choice_data_list:
Wait... Does that mean you're not allowed to
run?

Wait... Does that mean you're not allowed to
run?

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Ahaha... Yes, I'm afraid it does.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I was given leave to study abroad on<n>the condition that I'd
avoid anything<n>dangerous. That includes strenuous<n>
physical activities, so... no running,<n>and certainly no races.
choice_data_list: But if you're not allowed to race, then...

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Silly as it sounds, I wanted to study at<n>Tracen, no matter
what it took!

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
There are Umamusume my age,<n>pouring their whole hearts
into their<n>dreams... I wanted to talk to them—to<n>be their
friend.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
All in the hopes that someday those<n>memories will give me
strength. When<n>it comes time to shoulder my own<n>fate, I'll
have all these wonderful<n>experiences to draw upon.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The words come out so naturally, it<n>makes them feel that
much darker. I<n>painfully realize that no matter how<n>friendly
or unassuming she seems<n>now...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Fine Motion has unimaginably heavy<n>responsibilities waiting
for her back<n>home.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I'm lucky that Japan is such a<n>safe country! I don't
know how I<n>would've convinced my father<n>otherwise.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text:
I've already made so many friends, I<n>got to visit restaurants
I dreamed of,<n>and I've seen top-class races in<n>person.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: I'll be going home with the biggest<n>smile!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: The words escape before I can stop<n>myself.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I can't help it. She keeps emphasizing<n>how "happy" she is
just to visit<n>places or meet people... But I don't<n>believe for
second that she's happy<n>just watching other students
race.<n>After all...
choice_data_list:
Are you really getting the experience you
wanted?

Are you really getting the experience you
wanted?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Her eyes have lost all the light they<n>had at the race.

text_block_list.name: Fine Motion
text_block_list.text: Oh, um... I...

text_block_list.name: Security Captain
text_block_list.text:
...Your Highness. It is growing cold.<n>You should return to the
dormitory.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And that's it. Security leads her away<n>without another word.
But... even<n>without a proper answer, Fine<n>Motion's
reaction said everything.
choice_data_list: (I'm sure this isn't what she wants!)

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
Hey. You. Do you have any idea what<n>that little stunt did to
her?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Cut the crap! You know what I mean!<n>...Damn it.

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text:
If you haven't got the guts to follow<n>through, then piss off
and stop making<n>things worse.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Shakur's stern advice stings, and the<n>matter weighs ever
more heavily on<n>my mind...
